divs: Sighting DetailsI was siting on a table outside looking at the stars. i seen this glowing white light i thought it was a star i noticed it when it started moving around it flew right in to the trees fast my feelings i felt when i seen the UFO i was humbled i didn't know what it was i was shocked after it was done i was a little scared and i went back in my house i couldn't go to sleep that night i was worried i lost the UFO when it went flying in the trees fast i dont know if it landed i didn't see it anymore i was out side for 30minutes. the next day i went in to the woods to try to see if i can find evidence and there is no trace of anything.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Havelock
There were no other sightings in Havelock on or around December 15th 2012
Summary: White flashing light it was hovering for a few seconds and then it flew fast in to the trees.
